title: changing Freehand line width
content:
In Freehand MX Does anyone know how to convert line weights that appear in the object window as 0.00397 or 01375 to hairline (.25) and 1 pt.? I'm particularly concerned about keeping the settings as .25 and 1 pt. when using the Xtra\>Path\>Expand Stroke tool.  
email me at [thomas.lincoln@comcast.net](mailto:thomas.lincoln@comcast.net).  
Thanks,

Tlink
author: thomas lincoln
